name: UAC Bypass Using IEInstal - Process
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using IEInstal.exe (UACMe 64)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.IntegrityLevel:(High OR System) AND process.parent.executable:*\\ieinstal.exe AND process.executable:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* AND process.executable:*consent.exe)`
